title: Support ticket not showing up
body: I made a support ticket a bit ago, and having never done this before am unsure as to whether or not it should be showing up in this menu... pls help

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm glad you reached out here. I pulled up your account on my end and I'm not seeing any tickets at all. Try to submit that ticket again, and if it doesn't work this time feel free to email our support at support@riotgames.com
Oh thanks! The second ticket definitely did the trick :)
